Issue.creator: micbowman
Issue.summary: reduce use of SGX monotonic counters
Issue.description: The current code reads and increments the monotonic counter every time a wait timer is created. This is overkill and can potentially lead to NVM wear out in the ME. The monotonic counter is required for protection over reboots, but an in-memory counter (that uses the monotonic counter as an epoch) should be sufficient.
